function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Inadequate ventilation leading to increased residence time of small aerosols","Impact":"Higher risk of airborne transmission of contagious diseases such as COVID-19","Mitigation":"Increase ventilation rates, reduce duration of exposure, and reduce aerosol sources through occupancy control and masks","Technologies":"Advanced ventilation systems, air purifiers, and filtration systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and anyone in the building","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"},{"Description":"Movement of people leading to increased dispersal of CO2 tracer and aerosols","Impact":"Increased residence time of small aerosols and higher risk of disease transmission","Mitigation":"Reduce occupancy levels, promote use of face masks, and optimize building layouts for better airflow","Technologies":"Airflow modeling, occupancy tracking systems, and ventilation control systems","People":"Patients, healthcare workers, visitors, and anyone in the building","Owner":"Building management, healthcare facility management"}]}
